website_summaries.verdict: Tops our list for its attractive, heavy-duty bamboo construction that not only looks good, but also helps prevent spills and messes.
pros: Boasts a modern design with clean lines
Weighty construction is well-balanced and effectively withstands knocks and bumps for a cleaner feeding area
Non-slip base keeps it in place
Open design allows air to circulate, preventing mildew and bacterial growth
Available in three sizes for small, medium, and large breeds
cons: Bamboo requires occasional wiping to prevent permanent water spots

customer_reviews.title: Extremely wobbly
customer_reviews.text: Gaps everywhere! Glue and nails seem to be used to hold all four wooden pieces but the actual construction was not executed properly. The gaps cause the feeder to sway from side to side. I won't be returning since I like the other aspects of the feeder, but I'll be ripping out the nails and reconstructing the feeder myself. Certainly not worth the money if you have to disassemble and reassemble for proper use.
customer_reviews.author: Tomi

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product!
customer_reviews.text: Not only does this look great by my dog loves it! I couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: EpeeBrat

customer_reviews.title: Defective Design
customer_reviews.text: I do not recommend this item. It looks good but is poorly made. The stand is made of flimsy material and the whole thing wobbles when my bulldog tried to eat or drink. Since I bought it at a time when I was moving, I lost the window of opportunity to return it, so now it is just junk. If possible I would have given this a minus one star.
customer_reviews.author: A. Barber

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely a awesome product! We bought this feeder for our 12yrs ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely a awesome product! We bought this feeder for our 12yrs old Pit. She was having problems standing for any length of time, and not able to chew her food in full, do to having mammary gland cancer. She was able to sit and eat with ease. No choking, appeared it was easier for her to swallow. It comes with rubber/silicone seals that go around the bowls to help the bowls to stay snug into the wood holes. --- Haven't done any research to find out if those seals where replaceable ??? -- Love the idea the unit doesn't slid around on the floor, and its heavy enough, not to topple over.
customer_reviews.author: suZ

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and quality is nice
customer_reviews.text: I have a 15 lb mutt puppy and bought the 7”. Looks great and quality is nice. Comes with 4 dishes which is excellent and makes it easy to keep up with washing them before feedings. Unfortunately, she will probably outgrow the height relatively soon but very happy with the purchase. Dishes are big too which is nice because she can go through a lot of water. Doesn’t make the clinking sound like a metal dish on a metal holder does.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Lundeen

customer_reviews.title: Victory is mine.
customer_reviews.text: My 1-year old lab-mix loves to upend his food bowl, scattering his food all over the floor. It's a game to him, and it's a recipe-for-madness to me. We have hardwood floors, and that kibble tracks EVERYWHERE. I searched for an un-tippable food bowl, expecting some hideous, molded-plastic floor mat, and was pleasantly surprised to see something that looks quite pretty in addition to being solid. So I took a risk and bought it. Got it home, set it up, and loosed the "hound." He nosed the bowl. Nosed the holder. Couldn't budge it. I am 100% satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Quintenz

customer_reviews.title: Bowls
customer_reviews.text: The stand itself is a nice height for my Australian Shepherd, is well made and seems like it should last forever. However I'm disappointed with the bowls. The quality is ok but in the pictures on the Amazon sales site, it looks like two bowls are shallow and two are deep. Unfortunately all four are the same, very shallow. It's not a problem for food but the water dish is empty half the time. Guess I'll see if I can find a deeper bowl someplace. I would suggest that the seller, Pawfect Pets, update their picture to correct the false impression presented by the current picture. Unfortunately it looks like the taller stand has the same problem.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Much better than what I expected .  Love it !’
customer_reviews.text: We love this dog bowl feeder ! My Jake hasn’t splashed water since we replaced with this . The two different sized bowls included, we use the medium bowl for food and the deep bowl for water . Bless his little heart , I didn’t realize how awkward his other dog bowls were , Until I bought this one , He is finally eating at the appropriate level . I was pleasantly surprised on the quality and sturdiness of this feed station . I’m pretty sure this pit bull is feeling very special now . ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Mm1117

customer_reviews.title: Less mess
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this bowl for my cat he has a habit of moving his bowl around and making a mess when eating this product was a life changer, the weight of the frame keeps the bowls from sliding across the floor, and I notice that he barely if ever makes a mess when eating now due to the deep bowls that came with the base. I’ve had this product for around 7 months now and it’s been nothing but positive experience, excellent build and love the deep dish 5 stars. Safe buy
customer_reviews.author: Tyron J.

customer_reviews.title: Great for purpose.
customer_reviews.text: My elderly cat, who is a big Maine Coon has arthritis and stooping to eat or drink was painful. I purchased this model for him. So far, his being able to drink is much better and more comfortable. I like that it is wood and the bowls are stainless steel. Easy to clean. It comes assembled, which is a big plus. For the purpose that I purchased it, it is fine. I can even put the porcelain dish that he likes for food in it.
customer_reviews.author: Agatha Christie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect height!
customer_reviews.text: This elevated feeder is absolutely perfect! My dog's vet had suggested getting a raised feeder when our 8 year old Basset Hound began experiencing neck/back issues because a raised feeder would remove some of the stress. I was a little concerned about which one to buy and the height but after reading the reviews and measuring our pet, I decided to go with this one. Winner!!! Our dog took to it immediately and the height is perfect for her. Great construction; removable easy-clean bowls (with a second set). Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Nawn

customer_reviews.title: Cat loves her bowl. Pyrex fits in the hole!
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves her present. She does not have to crouch down at all. Best part about it...Her Pyrex water bowl fits in the hole. Pyrex glass is perfect for water, because you can see exactly where the water level is. She's been using it since she was a kitten. It fits right in the hole perfectly. That way at least she has one thing that is familiar for easier transition. Oh! And the Roomba can't make a mess pushing around the food and water bowl. I don't think this feeder is going anywhere. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Leely

customer_reviews.title: Love it 😇
customer_reviews.text: Just set it up for my dog and he seems to like it! He didn’t hesitate to eat out of it, the bowls are very deep and a nice quality, you get 4 (one is more shallow), it’s very sturdy despite some iffy reviews. Kind of smells like wood glue like it was just assembled but it’ll go away. Very carefully packaged and looks cute in our apartment. My Aussie is about 45lbs, knee-height and the 7” height is perfect for him, which was the hardest thing for me to gauge online so I’ll post pics to hopefully help the next person! We’ll see how it does long term but for $40, so far I’m impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Maynard

customer_reviews.title: Nice.
customer_reviews.text: It's a beautiful feeder and is the correct height for our dogs. My only complaint is that the bowls were not made very well. Although there are four, which is great, but th4 bowls have a crack in them towards the top. I assume it is the seam but I would expect better. They work well, just can't fill to the top or it will leak out. I'm not sure how practical bamboo is against water though. My dogs are messy drinkers and there are water spots on the top. But that is to be expected with real wood. I use a small amount of furniture polish on it once a week to keep it protected.
customer_reviews.author: Music fan

customer_reviews.title: I love this elevated pet feeder for my small dog
customer_reviews.text: I love this elevated pet feeder for my small dog. He is a shih tzu/yorkie mix and on the small side, about 15lbs. Even though he is small, I felt bad that he had to bend his neck all the way down to drink and eat. This feeder definitely solved the problem! It is just a tad too high for him but by using a shallow dish he is able to eat comfortably. It took him some time to get used to but he has no trouble with it now.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Angoco

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, but is WOBBLY!
customer_reviews.text: I love the appearance and function of this feeder/water bowl, and was glad to order based on the many good reviews. The bamboo has held up to daily water drips well. That said, the thing won't last long as one side is not adhered well and has a gag causing it to wobbly substantially when in use or being cleaned. Pretty disappointed in the quality of the product given the price tag.
customer_reviews.author: V. Coffland

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy enough for my dog. And bowls are on small side.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a raised feeder that would fit in with our decor and thought this one was cute. Description mentioned it is difficult for dogs to tip this over - not my dog. He is constantly trying to tip this over and he makes quite a mess doing it. Will probably have to find some bricks to set around it so he can't make such a mess. Also disappointed that the bowls are much smaller than what we're used to. It is nicely made, but not very practical for my pet. Will keep using it until I can't stand it anymore. thanks.
customer_reviews.author: N. Shay

customer_reviews.title: Well made and good looking
customer_reviews.text: We needed a dog bowl for our aging Australian Shepherd who is having neck pain. This allows him to eat without bending his neck and he is much happier. It is a sturdy, nice looking double bowl set. I really like it and it was exactly what I was looking for. No assembly required!
customer_reviews.author: Juliet Franzen

customer_reviews.title: Great feeders for the dog!
customer_reviews.text: These are great for my dogs. They (sisters) are a Lab mix and are tall enough that this is really helping with their eating. One is a little skittish because of the smell, but I'm hoping that will go away. Because they come entirely sealed in plastic, they have a persistent smell which I think is varnish.
customer_reviews.author: bugington

customer_reviews.title: attractive, sturdy, bowls slip but there's a work-around
customer_reviews.text: the plastic attachable ribs that keep the bowls from knocking around slip off the bowls and are difficult to put back on. i texted teh company and they sent a new set which worked fine for a while. as a work-around, i put three felt adhesive tabs on the inner circle of teh stand so the bowls don't knock around when the dog is eating. he's an strong dog but the stand and bowls hold up to his mad-dog gulping.
customer_reviews.author: deliveryodyssey

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed!
customer_reviews.text: I have never used this company before, but I thought I would give them a try. Lost our dog bowls in the shuffle of Hurricane Florence, and needed something quick when we returned home. Ordered the bowls and stand, the order came sooner than promised, and it is perfect for our Springer. The design and materials fit nicely in our kitchen style. The design is a sturdy one , better than bowl set we had before. I would recommend this company.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Hathaway

customer_reviews.title: I like this product very much - it's neat
customer_reviews.text: I like this product very much - it's neat, tidy, stable, attractive, and easy to clean. It comes with 4 easy to clean bowls. Best of all, my old, 3-legged doggie doesn't have to strain to eat, or eat lying down, neither of which were healthy for him. During the day, I fill both bowls with water, then at night empty out any remaining water from one bowl to fill it for dinner. Early is a 60 pound lab-hound mix, and the 7" elevation is just right for him.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Forsyth

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: We really like this feeder! We bought two for our two dogs. They look really nice and are not obtrusive like the stepstools we had the food bowls on before. They seem very sturdy and I don’t think they will tip over, though that would not be a problem for us since our dogs aren’t roudy eaters. It’s nice to have the extra set of bowls to wash one and use one. It would be nice to have the option of a slow feeder bowl, though as one of the dogs is a fast eater.
customer_reviews.author: Heartlady

customer_reviews.title: Not for messy drinkers
customer_reviews.text: The feeder gets two stars for attractiveness. It holds the bowls firmly and is sturdy enough that it won't move when your dog attacks its food. HOWEVER if your furry friend considers drinking water a bathing experience, water on floor and paws, this is not for you. We dry the feeder off twice a day and it remains wet. After two months the bottom is starting to mold and the area around the bowls is also showing signs of mold. So, if your dog gently laps water you might like this but if your dog is the least bit messy with water you will be much better off with something else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like the bottom plate
customer_reviews.text: This is a clean lined product. I have two side by side and the look is quite modern. I like the bottom plate, threw out the old mats that used to be under my bowls. The product logo is conveniently located to one side of the base, so that you can trun this to the wall and se only the bamboo. That was my worry when purchasing. No problem. My dogs are 40 pound labradoodles and they both like this height. The packaging was very good and the second set of bowls is a plus. All in all, a good purchase and much nicer looking than other sets, if you have a more modern decor in your home.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Petronis

customer_reviews.title: Effective and attractive
customer_reviews.text: This simple, uncomplicated design works and looks great. I appreciate that 2 extra bowls were included to swap out during washes, and that the bowls have rubber gaskets. The bowls are fairly large, too, which is great for the water side. A shallow bowl was included, too, which is perfect for the food side. The height is perfect for my mini bull terrier, who suffers from acid reflux. Since using this elevated feeder, her condition has gotten notably better. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Better than before
customer_reviews.text: Had to wait awhile to write this because it took my dog some time to get used to it. She is severely disabled, and it causes a lot of problems with her hips and joints. I thought this would make it easier for her so she wouldn't have to bend over, but she seemed to be afraid of it at first (not the manufacturer's fault, my dog is just afraid of everything). Btw, my fur baby is a 45 pound pit mix with very stubby legs and the medium was just the right height for her.
customer_reviews.author: thatkewlkid

customer_reviews.title: Happy Fur Baby Mom
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and benefits for this type of feeder. I have a shitzu and although he's just 5yrs old i want him to live as comfortably as possible. He was hesistant at first to eat from this but he really seems to like it. It came with 4 bowls. Super happy with that since i can place those on the feeded while i wash the other two bowls. It was just as described. Worth the money , for me.
customer_reviews.author: ED2

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves it. I am happy.
customer_reviews.text: I have 9-year-old (larger-sized) Cavalier King Charles Spaniel. I noticed he was taking a break when eating. So bought this raised water and food bowl. He is so much more comfortable and doesn't have to put head down to eat or drink. He is now very happy. Doesn't spill water or food on floor. Comes with four bowls that fit nicely in holes. Bowls have a rubber ring just under rim which prevents leaks down.
customer_reviews.author: VikingQueen

customer_reviews.title: Structurally Weak
customer_reviews.text: Gotta add this to the “looked great online” list. Looked great out of the box too...until we discovered the top was loose. Closer inspection revealed joints simply glued together, so overall structurally weak.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Vesta

customer_reviews.title: Great all around product
customer_reviews.text: My puppy could not knock these over and the rubber rings hold the bowls in place so no sound is made. The wood base construction is solid. I have used for a year now and just as good as ever. Also, good for dog digestion so they are not bending their necks down to eat. I wasn't sure if my golden doodle puppy, 10 lbs., would be tall enough to use but he had no problem reaching the bottom of the bowls and now he's 40 lbs. and still perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Feed/Water Station for Cats Missing A Front Leg!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a 7" feeder for a cat I adopted that had to have a front leg amputated due to injury/infection. This is an EXCELLENT choice for my cat, giving added support for his chest. He & I love his new pretty feeding & watering station. It's quality material & sturdy. U won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jl

customer_reviews.title: She did not like to square-type bowls
customer_reviews.text: Well built, my dog adapted to it quickly asking me why I had not got her a raised feeding area sooner. The bamboo is water resistant since my dog is a sloppy drinker. She did not like to square-type bowls, so I just put her food in a round 'people' bowl and set it inside the stainless steel feeder bowls. Problem solved. Glad I invested in a quality feeder instead of a cheap, junky one. This one will easily carry her through her life.
customer_reviews.author: Outspoken1

customer_reviews.title: Really like these elevated dog dishes
customer_reviews.text: These elevated dishes seem pretty sturdy--my shepherd puppy likes playing in water and she hasn't been able to knock this over to get to the water. We also have a whippet and a short Norfolk terrier mix. The whippet seems much more comfortable eating from these dishes, and the bonus for me is that my short dog uses them as well. I no longer need several dog bowls. I wish I had ordered this years ago for our whippet. I also appreciate having 4 bowls so I can always have a set clean.
customer_reviews.author: VK in NC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect product for our needs!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect heighth for our senior mini aussie. Other units either too short or too high. Appreciate the sturdiness of the unit, the additional bowls, the more shallow bowl for food and larger one for water, the grips to keep bowls in place, additional hardware included if needed for the base. Packaged well for delivery. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like the look of it but it wobbles back and ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of it but it wobbles back and forth. I don't think it's very securely put together and I'll have to see if there's a way to tighten it down. It's also missing a bowl. I got 3 out of the 4 which I wouldn't really care about if the thing was solid and well out together. Pretty disappointed. Hope this is helpful for you.
customer_reviews.author: wilinili

customer_reviews.title: Saves My Old Girls Backs
customer_reviews.text: I have two dogs that are getting older. I feel like these stands (I bought 2 of them) have helped them eat their food without having to stoop over so much, which is getting harder for them. A must have if you have older dogs. My cats just think the water bowl is fun to play in, but my dogs can't mind.
customer_reviews.author: M. P.

customer_reviews.title: Not only a great water and pet feeder but a nice  piece of furniture..
customer_reviews.text: I have two small dogs( 10 lbs and 17 lbs) and I purchased the medium sized feeder. It is the first time that my dogs have not coughed following consuming water. It is perfect and I appreciated receiving four bowls with rubber like collars to hold the bowls in the holder . Finally, I appreciate that this is a nice looking feeder not the usual 'doggie' dishes moving around on the kitchen floor.
customer_reviews.author: Tj

customer_reviews.title: Well-made Pet Feeder
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this elevated pet feeder a few months ago and have been very pleased. It's well-made and much nicer on the eyes than the mismatched bowls on the ugly boot tray we were using! It's a good value compared to other elevated feeders I've seen in my local pet store: it's priced at or below others, it's sturdy, and it comes with two extra bowls. My dog is a terribly messy drinker, so he will leave pools of water on the wood. I can see how this might eventually damage the wood, but for now it seems to wipe up easily without leaving any water stains behind.
customer_reviews.author: AngieS

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love it.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this product. The bowls were a good size, and the height was good for my long legged sighthound. However, the product arrived chipped on the top and with the frame bent (so one side was straight and the other angled). The nails used to attach the top and bottom to the sides were exposed in between the boards, as if they hadn't been hammered in all the way (possibly accounting for the bending). The box was in good shape, so I knew it couldn't have been a shipping accident. Returned it, and I'll have to keep looking!
customer_reviews.author: AmRitt

customer_reviews.title: Love this raised feeder
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something with a little style and this thing has it. It comes with extra bowls in two sizes and works perfectly for my dog. She used to grab her bowls and sling food and water all over the place, but she cannot do that with this setup. Big plus is it is not an ugly plastic thing.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Fannin

customer_reviews.title: It did look pretty for the first month.. not after however
customer_reviews.text: I bought it because it looks nice... HOWEVER.. I’ve only had this for less than 1 month, and if water gets on the bamboo, it water stains the wood. If you look at my photo, the darker wood on the right side is the original color. The lighter part is all water stained. I wouldn’t buy it again. They need a white one that’s water repellent. Bowls are nice and big for my 50lb labradoodle
customer_reviews.author: Minh, I buy everything

customer_reviews.title: Super Sleek and Efficient!
customer_reviews.text: Well so far so good. My other cat feeder was too low and bowls to small. I had a mess of cat food all around the bowl. The water spilled as well. Now, though, my cat can easily access the food and it doesn't go flying all over the room. Not to mention how stylish this bad boy is. It has clean lines and is very contemporary. All in all, definitely a win for myself and my adorable cat!
customer_reviews.author: Groovy Gammy

customer_reviews.title: Loving this Dish
customer_reviews.text: I really love this dish. My GSD pup is 12 weeks and has doubled in size since we got him 4 weeks ago. The set we'd purchased had a silicone base. He tore it to shreds and learned to flip his dishes in the meantime. Noticed a week ago how much he was straining to eat. The only con so far....the rubber ring wont stay on the shallow dish. Still worth 5 stars. Will revisit after some time has passed
customer_reviews.author: D. Porter

customer_reviews.title: Nice Looking and Quite Functional.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product except for the fact that the bottom piece of wood is a rough cut and not a smooth finish like the top piece. I am not sure if this is a water resistant finish or just the natural bamboo repelling water. My Goldendoodle puppy loves to splash in the water bowl so water spills down. As long as this doesn't warp or deteriorate then I am good. Its sturdy, looks great and doesn't move around. Update: over 2 years old now. Great product. The wood is still in perfect condition. The feeder doesn't move around and its the perfect height at 7.5" No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Beachfire

customer_reviews.title: Muttley is happy!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice feeder. It is attractive and it is working out for my dog. However, I must say that it is a little flimsy and I'm a little concerned about how long it will last. If you gently press on the sides, there is considerable "give". I hope it lasts awhile because it really looks good and it is convenient to use, meaning that the extra bowls help make meal time easier.
customer_reviews.author: lizbeth

customer_reviews.title: Arrived demolished - cheaply built
customer_reviews.text: Can't vouch for use of the product, because ours arrived demolished. The product box had been partially smashed and retaped, and the stand inside had completely collapsed. (The Amazon box was pristine on the outside.) The glue and tiny nails at three of four seams had given way. If you have big pets or even small children tempted to stand on this thing, it might fold like a house of cards. Seeing this quality in person, I'm not sure I would take an exchange.
customer_reviews.author: J.D. Reviewington

customer_reviews.title: Quality Feeder A bit to tall for my Maine Coons
customer_reviews.text: i measured my large cats 15 and 20 lb height. i thought the 7" would be perfect. the bowls are deep. the bowls are better than bowls on counters which they have to lay down. so, i don't think this feeder is good for cats. i did purchase the shorter 4" and that was perfect for my dachshund (under 12 lbs.). the tray is very well constructed. they give you extra bowls. also, there are silicone bands for the bowls to keep them snug.
customer_reviews.author: Moonlight Glitter Girl

customer_reviews.title: Water leakage has caused mold on the bottom shelf.
customer_reviews.text: It is very attractive but I am not happy with the water leakage which had caused the bottom shelf to mold in some areas. I don't think the bottom shelf had the same finish at the top shelf. Please advise me. I even tried cleaning the mold and applying Furniture oil polish but it didn't help. I like the way it keeps my puppy from choking when drinking.
customer_reviews.author: Carmella T.

customer_reviews.title: Worth It & Dog Approved!
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with this new feeder! The open space makes it easy to clean and a sturdy spot for your dogs bowls to go. The extra bowls are perfect to have on hand and the rubber grips make for a strong hold in the base with no spill opportunities. Love using the smaller bowl for my pup’s food and larger bowl for his water! If you’re debating buying, just buy.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Very nice. Clean lines and easy to keep clean
customer_reviews.text: Looks lovely and clean in our kitchen. We had a hard time finding something the right size since our 40 pound dog and 10 pound cats share a water bowl. This fits the bill. It’s just a touch on the small side as far as what it holds so we are refilling water frequently. It’s probably as high as we can go for the one particularly petite cat though.
customer_reviews.author: sue72

customer_reviews.title: Best ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect height!! My little dog, and the big dog can both use this tall version. I like that it comes with 4 bowls. I use it strictly for water. Each dog has their own dish. I've tried several other types. This is by far the best.
customer_reviews.author: Kathi Brown

customer_reviews.title: Looks don’t last - and beware of mold!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice design - compact, quite nice looking, very sturdy. Unfortunately, because it holds a water bowl... first the finish got washed off, then black mold came. I tried cleaning it again and again but it is a big ugly mold mess.
customer_reviews.author: L. Hale

customer_reviews.title: Good looking feed tray for my dog.
customer_reviews.text: This feeding tray looks good, it is easy to clean and it is the perfect height for my 32# Shepard mix. My only problem (not much of a problem) is it comes with a rubber band to go around the bowls to buffer the SS bowl to the stand. on the smaller bowl (which I use for his food bowl) the rubber band just pops off.. it still works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Robert S. Thickman

customer_reviews.title: comes wiht 4 metal dishes
customer_reviews.text: My Boston Terrier was a little afraid of the stand at first. But with some reassurance she is eating from it now. The dishes are a little large for her and I don't think she like putting her head down in the bowl. So for a larger dog this would be fine. I put a plate over the opening and her smaller dish on top. And this works just fine. I love the quality of this pet feeder and am hoping it will last a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Feeder
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful, high quality feeder. I love the extra bowls included so one set can be on the dishwasher and one feeding my dog. I got the 7 inch high item and it is the perfect size for my 65 lb Walrus (Bassett hound/Sharpei). She was hesitant to use it at first since she is 5 and has never used an elevated feeder before. Within a day she was good with it. I feel like feeding and watering off the ground is healthier for her and better for her long ack. I highly recommend this feeder.
customer_reviews.author: Travel Alot

customer_reviews.title: The bowls are poor quality, but I love the stand.
customer_reviews.text: We've had this product for about a month, one of the stainless steel bowls has cracked around the rim and is very sharp. I'm surprised at the poor quality of the bowls.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pet bowls
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had bought this sooner. It's the perfect height for my spaniel/setter mix. She is getting old and it really helps her. She also flips her bowls when she wants more water and this allows her to put her paw up without flipping them over. I really like it. Hopefully the wood will stand up overtime.
customer_reviews.author: Torres Family

customer_reviews.title: Overall liked this feeder
customer_reviews.text: Overall liked this feeder. The frame was a little loose when it came, but some superglue along the seams and it was good to go. Love that there's an extra set of bowls.
customer_reviews.author: angela quinn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect dog bowl.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 7inch one for our beagle and it works perfect for him we also got a mini dachshund a few months later and he learned to climb up and drink the water out of it. So now it works perfect for both of them.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea S.

customer_reviews.title: Was disappointed as I preferred a wood product over a plastic ...
customer_reviews.text: Product was delivered a mess. It was completely coming apart at all joints. Because there was absolutely no packing support I tried to put it back together at the joints to secure it, it was about 1/4 inch separated at all joints where nails were securing top to sides and completely slanted. I secured the joints but still wobbles side to side. The bottom piece was sealed on the bottom side instead of the exposed side so the exposed side is rough, unsanded and unsealed. Was disappointed as I preferred a wood product over a plastic one. Boo.
customer_reviews.author: laura

customer_reviews.title: Great For Older Dogs!
customer_reviews.text: My Boston is 15 years old and is blind and has diabetes. It is also difficult for him to stand for very long because his leg muscles are very weak. This product has helped him so much. He is able to get his water on one side and his food on the other side. I put dry food for him during the day which I was not able to do before and he goes on his own and eats his food when he is hungry during the day. This product is very sturdy and very easy to clean. I highly recommend it especially for older dogs with problems standing. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice - Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Besides being beautiful and well made, I love that it comes with 4 bowls. It’s the perfect height for my old rescue dog - Blue Healer. Poor old guy had a hard time eating from bowls placed on the floor, it was difficult for him to stand in that position of leaning over to eat. I’m so pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous and Well-Made
customer_reviews.text: This product is as beautiful as is shown in the pictures, which can rarely be said about products. All that the company claim to be features of the product are actually great features, indeed. The two different sizes of bowls allow my dog to have as much water as he wants with the large bowl and the smaller bowl is perfect for the amount of food that he eats at each meal. The o-rings are magical because they prevent clanging and water leakage (he's a messy little guy). I would recommend this product wholeheartedly.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony A.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty darn good
customer_reviews.text: This was a welcome home gift for a Border Collie my sister rescued, moving into a 1950s house. The style was on point, the height and size of the bowls "perfect," and although it took longer to arrive than they initially guesstimated, nobody minded when they saw it and it was so nice. Can't speak to how well it will hold up, but as of right now, they are happy.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this product unless you have someone who can ...
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this product unless you have someone who can fix it for you. Out of the box, it is poorly assembled and very wobbly.
customer_reviews.author: 45F

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I have a beagle, and like all beagles, she LIVES for food. This elevated bowl holder is the perfect height. But, more importantly, the holder keeps her from scooting her bowl all over the kitchen floor while trying to lick it clean. No more looking under table and chairs, wondering where did her bowl go?
customer_reviews.author: cassie

customer_reviews.title: Great bowl set
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I needed. Good height for a blue heeler and jack Russel. It looks nice and seems to be of good quality. We got it because we we're tired of tripping over the dog bowl and our dog overturning his bowl when he wanted something. Hasn't turned it and we haven't tripped over it since
customer_reviews.author: Brittanyk

customer_reviews.title: Will grow mold
customer_reviews.text: I've had this feeder about 2 months now. I used the provided silicone rings at first, but after a few weeks they grew mold between them and the wood. I removed the rings and it was fine for a while, but now the underside of the feeder is growing black mold. The pic I took is after trying to scrub it clean. My dog is admittedly a messy drinker, but I remove the bowl and wipe the feeder dry daily, so I don't think it should be growing mold like this.
customer_reviews.author: Hinkley

customer_reviews.title: Treat your pet to a classy, new feeder!
customer_reviews.text: We love this feeding dish! It looks great in our kitchen, is just the right height for our Cockapoo, and is very easy to keep clean! We put the bowls in the dishwasher nightly and they come out sparkling clean! This is way better than our previous metal holder. You'll be pleased with the quality of this product!
customer_reviews.author: YogaLover

customer_reviews.title: Great for large breed puppy
customer_reviews.text: I have a 5 month old black lab and i wanted something taller for him to eat and drink out of. This product is the perfect hight. He does not have to bend to much to eat. Very easy to use and clean. Cooper loves it.
customer_reviews.author: BusyMom411

customer_reviews.title: Vet recommended...puppy approved!
customer_reviews.text: Our golden retriever was having trouble with digestion, waking in the early morning to relieve his urge to clear his throat (and tummy in the process). Our vet suggested an elevated feeding system and he was right on track. This feeder is very attractive and just the right size. The bowls clean easily, and most of all...we're all sleeping through the night and looking forward to mealtime!
customer_reviews.author: Liane R.

customer_reviews.title: Dog seems to like it
customer_reviews.text: Our Shepard mutt seems to appreciate having food and water elevated off the ground a bit. She drinks more water, it seems like, and makes less of a mess with the dry dog food we use. The bowls come with little silicon bands that keep the bowls from clanking when the dog is eating. Nice touch! Having 2 sets of bowls is really handy.
customer_reviews.author: J. Cobb

customer_reviews.title: Recommend for all pets. Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to aid in my puppy's digestion (any design, brand would do this), but I didn't want to spend a ton of money in case it wasn't functional. This works out great. The style and color look great, its extremely easy to clean. The rubber pads on the bottom ensure water and food don't get trapped against the bottom of the wood so it doesn't corrode. Even the kitty has decided he prefers to eat out of the dog bowl, so when she's not eating we put the kitty food bowl in the dog bowl.
customer_reviews.author: tori marie

customer_reviews.title: Seems durable
customer_reviews.text: We thought it’d be better for our dogs neck to have his bowls raised. These bowls are too large. The silver/see reflections seem to startle our dog (same with if his tag clinks the bowl). Something other than metal would be better.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, even better customer service
customer_reviews.text: The customer service of this company is spectacular. They have made this buying experience worth while. The elevated feeder is very sturdy and well built, our only concern was the puddling of water from our drinking dogs. But Pawfect Pets has gone above and beyond to help us
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Cute and good quality
customer_reviews.text: First Impression: It’s cute and good quality. I got it for my pug (max height I’d get for a pug). You get a second set of bowls, which is cool. If it were possible, I’d want the second set to be a more shallow bowl, cuz he’s not big on the depth of the bowl for food (cuz he’s high maintenance). Other than that the little storage space underneath can be useful!
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, good quality
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in my kitchen and is the right height for my 15lb terrier. It even came with an extra set of bowls, so one set can get washed while the other set is being used. Really happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda V Butler

customer_reviews.title: Looks beautiful and is sturdy, no noise
customer_reviews.text: Really well made and keeps the bowls from sliding and clanging noisily when my dog eats. They are a nice height for my medium sized dog. It comes with enough stainless steel bowls, so that you can rotate them as you wash them. It seems to wear well even after spilling water several times over the wood!
customer_reviews.author: Cc customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy raised bowls are helpful
customer_reviews.text: Since our dog was getting older I wanted to help him out by not having to bend clear to the floor for his food. He's done really well with this product. I'm glad that there are two sizes of bowls.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jo Laubacher

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking, sturdy feeder
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking, sturdy feeder. My only reason for not giving 5 stars is because the feeder arrived with two small pieces of wood not glued to the wood. I believe one piece was probably broken during shipping. I do not know what the other piece is for. It fits in the middle but slips right thru and falls out. The size is good for my 19 lb. Maltipoo.
customer_reviews.author: Coffee Lover

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: like the look of it, seems to be made pretty well, our min pin loves his new bowls. The fact that they are slightly elevated helps keeps his legs from sliding on the hardwood floor while he eats and drinks since he doesn't have to reach down as far.
customer_reviews.author: C.G.

customer_reviews.title: Good size and matches our home
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size for my small but tall dog. The bowls are a bit big for him so I put his food on a plate and place the plate over one of the stainless steel bowls. I fill the other bowl with water. So far spills have stayed on top and not on the floor. Water has not caused any marks on the wood. It is heavy enough so that it does not get accidentally moved and it matches our home nicely.
customer_reviews.author: kim saxon

customer_reviews.title: Wood discolored when gotten wet
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying I LOVE the look of this and it’s super sturdy. My issue with this is that the MOMENT a bit of water dripped on the wood it became permanently discolored. I was SO disappointed. These are water bowls for dogs! They are OBVIOSULY going to get wet! So, they look awesome, they’re very sturdy, but not sealed properly to prevent water damage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... to be ideal solution for helping the pups eat comfortably. Solid quality and looks pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Appears to be ideal solution for helping the pups eat comfortably. Solid quality and looks pretty good. These were much (much!) less expensive and better looking than what we found in large pet stores.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Great item but our dog is picky about the bowls
customer_reviews.text: I can't fault the item itself. Well made and heavy enough not to get pushed around. Looks great and its the right hight for our 14 year old dog not to bend down to eat. However for some reason our dog doesn't want to eat out of the bowls that come with it. We washed them well and they look perfect. But something about them makes her not want to drink of eat from them. So I put in a couple of other dishes and she loves the extra height. Doesn't look as nice as the ones that come with it but we are happy.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen J.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Great value: sturdy, attractive, and just the right height. Love the extra bowls, silicone 'gaskets' that reduce noise, and sleek design. Easy to clean, too. Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Red Dahlia

customer_reviews.title: Aesthetically Pleasing Design
customer_reviews.text: Solid construction - very happy with the quality of wood and sturdy construction. The exterior facing wood is polyurethaned. The interior facing wood is not so recommend applying some poly to repel the water/food splatter to help protect the really pretty stand. For future products - please consider adding a solid top option instead of our having to use the included bowls. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: K En

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Feeder for Arthritic Dogs
customer_reviews.text: I use this feeder for my dog. She has arthritis in her back and hips, and she had lots of trouble standing up while using regular food bowls. This feeder has made a huge difference in her comfort and ability to stand while eating. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the modern look
customer_reviews.text: I really love this dog feeder! It’s stylish and looks great in my house. It came with 4 bowls, which is perfect. I throw two in the dishwasher and have two fresh ones to put in without waiting. At first I thought 4 bowls were excessive, but I actually really like it!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Van Meter

customer_reviews.title: Solved Our Problem
customer_reviews.text: We ordered the dog feeder because we had 2 separate bowls that would slide around, and there was always food and water on the floor nearby. The feeder we have now stays in one place, and our dog's eating area is much cleaner. The extra set of bowls is nice to have, too. We regularly switch, so he always has a clean bowl.
customer_reviews.author: M. Fenn

customer_reviews.title: BOWLS ARE JUNK
customer_reviews.text: The bamboo is sturdy and looks very nice. These bowls are not stainless steel. There is left over film in the water (even after using purified water). The coating at the bottom of the bowl is falling apart after just 5 days! I now have to purchase actual stainless steel bowls so my dog is safe.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Hickok

customer_reviews.title: Great food bowl for dogs
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this around 6pm on Sunday and got it at 130pm Monday. WOW! I have 2 Springer Spaniels so this one went to the slightly shorter one Its very nice. if there is a taller one i will order for the other girl. It's great
customer_reviews.author: lcstvclk

customer_reviews.title: Wobbly
customer_reviews.text: Nice materials, but low craftsmanship - ours showed up racked (the top had shifted from the bottom leaving only one side with the slope) and there was a gap in the seams where the sides joined to the bottom = wobbles from side to side.
customer_reviews.author: thmopar71

customer_reviews.title: It has enabled Bogart to eat without getting food into his nasal cavity.
customer_reviews.text: My sweet dog, Bogart, has no teeth and a broken jaw that is too old to repair. He often has difficulty eating wet dog food without getting it up into his sinuses. Amazingly, eating from this elevated feeding bowl has allowed him to eat without ingesting it in his nose and upwards. I am so pleased for him to have this comfort. It is easy to clean, very sturdy, and extra bowls are an added plus.
customer_reviews.author: sandra popejoy

customer_reviews.title: They feel like they will withstand anything and they are beautiful
customer_reviews.text: These feeders are SOLID! They feel like they will withstand anything and they are beautiful. We bough a large and a medium size--the large doesn't seem as sturdy and isn't quite as pretty; I wish it was built similarly to the other sizes. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh

customer_reviews.title: MOLD
customer_reviews.text: These are the worst. The wood molded within a week. It was terrible. I would think that the designer would assume water would get spilt on them. I had to throw them away. No amount of scrubbing could save them. Do not buy theses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy clean and good quality
customer_reviews.text: I like the two sizes of bowls as I use one of each. I would use the two smaller ones if two small ones came with it, but 1 has been ok. This is just the right height for my rat Terrier that is about 13 inches to shoulder. It is sturdy and easy to clean and has really helped my old dog eat and drink water more easily. I would recommend this product. Only improvement would be to provide choice of two shorter or deeper bowls. Nice that they provide extra ones for cleaning purposes. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Davis

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and comes assembled but it started getting black in ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks good and comes assembled but it started getting black in the areas exposed to water in week 1. Months later it’s a germ magnet and I have to throw it away bc it is covered in mold or what the black stuff is, I don’t even know. Tried to clean it many times but it’s the wood. You should paint it with a clear coat if u order it.
customer_reviews.author: Zarah

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Pet Feeder
customer_reviews.text: I really like this feeder. It's sturdy and very nice. A bit larger than I thought for my one cat. I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Hillcat

product_meta.title: Premium 7" Elevated Dog and Cat Pet Feeder, Double Bowl Raised Stand Comes with Extra Two Stainless Steel Bowls. Perfect for Dogs and Cats.
feature_bullets: ★ SPILL PROOF - LARGE DOGS CAN’T KNOCK IT OVER: A sturdy stand keeps your dog food and water from ending up on the floor in a big mess. Weighs over 6 lbs to prevent strong dogs from nudging bowls around the floor and tipping the contents out.

★ REDUCES BLOATING & NECK STRAIN IN DOGS: Pets with arthritis, neck or back problems find it a relief to eat from a raised feeder. Digestive health is dramatically improved when dogs no longer have to strain unnaturally to eat from ground level.

★ FOUR STAINLESS STEEL BOWLS FOR CLEAN EATING: Stainless steel bowls are easy to keep clean and hygienic. Because we know how important your pet’s health is to you, we’re including an extra set of two bowls - so you always have a fresh bowl ready. Set includes three bowls with 6 cup capacity and one bowl with 4 cup capacity.

★ LEAK PROOF - ATTRACTIVE DESIGN LOOKS GREAT IN ANY HOME: Silicone rings keep the dishes securely in place and prevent the bowls from clanging or leaking through and puddling on the floor below. Aging and injured or taller dogs can eat without pain.
★ PAWFECT PETS PROMISE: We know your pet will love eating from our raised pet bowl stand, but if you’re unsatisfied with your elevated pet feeder for any reason simply return it hassle-free.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
